ygData.subject: Re: Pet abilities
ygData.msgSnippet: My box of abukar is my weapon storage. Heavy weapons go in  the box, liughter in the ee bag. ... ______________________________________________________ Get
ygData.messageBody:
My box of abukar is my weapon storage. Heavy weapons go in the box,
liughter in the ee bag.


>From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Pet abilities
>Date: Mon, 14 Feb 2000 15:01:32 -0600
>
> > I think even finding rusty weapons is a PIA. I have not seen daylight
>from
> > sola for quite a long time and I can't always find a gob with a weapon
>let
> > alone finding 2 gobs with weapons. What even tops it all off is that
> > sometimes it takes me 3 pets to break into a spot so I can hunt. So if
>I
>am
> > lucky I have 6 fs steel daggers just so that I can maximize my pets
> > potential and thats if I'm lucky. But 9 times out of 10 if I find a
>weapon,
> > it's heavier then a fs dagger and what verant wants me to be is be
> > encumbered with the craptacular str that they give us casters because we
> > have to carry around lots of weapons to get their broken pets working
>right.
>
>I hear ya :) My guildmates always ask "why do you still give it daggers?
>it
>doesn't matter now!" my reply of course is "look at the weight on a
>dagger,
>and then look at the weight on a short sword...which of those would you
>want
>to carry 8 of around with you?"
>
>My evil eye bag is dedicated to carrying pet weapons, sad really. :P some
>day I'll get a tinger bag to compliment it, and perhaps I'll be able to
>actually keep stuff to sell.
>
